title: Light properties reset after moved by model manipulator

content.raw:
Steps to reproduce the problem:

1. Start gzserver worlds/lights.world

2. Start gzclient

3. On the world tree, select lights -> spot, the spot light is selected

4. On the toolbar, select translate mode, the manipulator is attached to the spotlight

5. Drag the light to a new location with the manipulator

6. Close gzclient, open another gzclient 

The light will be in the new position, but it became a white point light.
